participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and creative, Jordan enjoys sharing experiences and is always on the lookout for connection.
participant_1.background: My most valuable thing is my memory of seeing Ween live in concert. I'm majoring in business and love to lamp, but the hardest thing I've ever done was trying to explain this to my parents. I cannot get enough of rap music, it's so good. I love the desert. I have never been married, but I've been with my partner for over ten years.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Michael finds joy in the little things and values deep connections.
participant_2.background: I'm looking forward to spending time with my son playing some games together. I am a wildlife photographer, and I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field. I love huge paintings. I prefer to read books to get my entertainment, so social media isn't very important to me. I am saving up to buy a new camera.

content.text: Hi there! I have not had a lot of fun experiences with the people I have met online.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that! I'm sure there are lots of great people out there, you just have to keep looking.
I agree! I'm always hopeful. Maybe you and I can become friends!
I would love that! I'm always looking for new friends.
What are some of your hobbies?
I like to read and spend time outdoors. I also like to take pictures.
I like reading too! I also love to be outdoors. I'm not very good at taking pictures though.
That's okay! I'm sure you're better at it than you think.
I hope so! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I'm especially interested in historical fiction and non-fiction.
I like historical fiction too! I'm not a big fan of non-fiction.
Oh, that's too bad. I love learning about new things.
I like learning new things too, but I find it hard to focus on non-fiction books.
I know what you mean. Sometimes it's hard to stay focused on a book that doesn't have a story.
Exactly! Have you read any good books lately?
I just finished reading "The Great Alone" by Kristin Hannah. It was really good.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good story.
